game.name: Sonic Colors Demastered
game.desc: Sonic Colors Demastered is a 2D reimagining of Sonic Colors for the Nintendo Wii and Nintendo DS. The game features gameplay inspired by the Sonic Rush series and fully original level design. The game also features a fully original soundtrack produced by Randomocity Remixes, KITSUN3POWR, Mr_Shoemonster, and David Johnson.
